Header: Bangladesh NDC Team Arrives on Familiarization Tour
Content: A 23-member delegation from the Bangladesh National Defence College (NDC), arrived in Sri Lanka Sunday (16) morning on a familiarization tour as part of their training programme at the NDC. The delegation on Tuesday (18) evening called on the Chief of Staff of the Sri Lanka Army Major General Dampath Fernando at the Army Headquarters representing the Commander of the Army who is away from the country. During the meeting, Major General Aruna Wanniarachchi, Director General Training presented a comprehensive account on ‘Humanitarian Operations and New Developments in the Army’. The 23-member delegation, headed by Rear Admiral Muhammad Anwarul Islam of the Bangladesh Navy is comprised of student officers from Armed Forces of Bangladesh, India, Nigeria Tanzania and Bangladesh Civil Service.
